toLevel5.question: How does control rod material selection affect the long-term radioactive waste produced by a reactor?
toLevel5.correct: Different materials produce different activation products with varying half-lives
toLevel5.correctExplanation: Neutron absorption creates radioactive isotopes. Cadmium produces Cd-113m, silver produces Ag-108m and Ag-110m. These have different handling requirements.
